name: Lime Bowl
description:
This delicately shaped bowl is simple and light, and constructed from solid Mugavu wood, giving it a beautiful grain. It is perfect as a decorative centerpiece or as a shallow fruit bowl on counters or tables.

Specs:

•	Approximate Dimensions: 8"w x 3"h
•	Materials: Locally-sourced Mugavu Wood

Notes: 

Each bowl is unique, one of a kind and hand-turned on a lathe by an artisan in Uganda. Therefore, the color and grain may vary from that pictured. To care for bowl, hand wash with mild soap and lukewarm water and towel dry immediately. To keep the wood well conditioned and protected, it is recommended that you apply beeswax salve or wood oil every 3-4 weeks.

name: Zig Zag Lamp
description:
The ultimate pillar of light, this eclectic lamp is unlike any other. Made with solid, durable Mugavu wood, it mixes raw, African style inspired by the natural forests of Uganda, with modern, clean lines inspired by the California coast. It is topped with a handmade, large white drum shade made of fine linen and cotton.

Specs: 

•	Approximate Dimensions: Base: 7.5"w x 11"h Shade: 15"w x 8"h 
•	Locally-sourced Mugavu wood base
•	Off-white linen/cotton shade 
•	Black rayon fabric cord
•	Volts: 110
•	Max Wattage: 250
•	UL Listed: Yes
	 
Notes:  

Each lamp base is unique, one of a kind and handmade by an artisan in Uganda. Therefore, the color, grain and exact size and shape of the base may vary slightly from that pictured. To care for lamp, simply wipe clean.

name: Arrow Lamp
description:
This unique table lamp brightens up a room with its versatility, undeniable style, modern lines and natural colors. It is handmade using solid Mugavu and Elgon Teak, which are stacked to perfection. Topped with a handmade, large black drum shade made of fine linen and cotton.

Specs: 
•	Approximate Dimensions: Base: 6"w x 12"h Shade: 15"w x 8"h 
•	Locally-sourced Mugavu wood and Elgon Teak base
•	Black linen/cotton shade 
•	Black rayon fabric cord
•	Volts: 110
•	Max Wattage: 250
•	UL Listed: Yes

Notes:  

Each lamp base is unique, one of a kind and handmade by an individual artisan in Uganda. Therefore, the color, grain and exact size and shape of the base may vary slightly from that pictured. To care for lamp, simply wipe clean.

name: Bell Jar Lamp
description:
The Bell Jar Lamp is the epitome of warm ambiance and timeless style. With its rustic and industrial charm, it’s the missing piece to any home office desk, lonely corner of the living room, or the night-light your little one shows off to friends. The solid Mugavu base is hand-turned by lathe and topped with a simple glass bell jar, perfect for showing off the glow of an Edison-style filament bulb (not included.) 

Specs: 
•	Approximate Dimensions: Base: 5"w x 2"h Glass: 4.5"w x 8"h 
•	Locally-sourced Mugavu wood base
•	Glass bell jar shade
•	Antique-brass socket with 3-way rotary turn knob
•	Red rayon fabric cord with toggle switch 
•	Volts: 110
•	Max Wattage: 250
•	UL Listed: Yes
•	Accommodates a medium screw base (E26) Edison-style filament bulb that is 4" tall or less (not included)

Notes:  

Each lamp base is unique, one of a kind and hand-turned on a lathe by an artisan in Uganda. Therefore, the color, grain and exact size and shape of the base may vary slightly from that pictured. 

To care for lamp, simply wipe clean.

name: Whisky Tumbler Set, Light Horn
description:
These ethically sourced cow horn whisky tumblers are the perfect accompaniment to your favorite single-malt whisky. Each tumbler is cut from a Ugandan Ankole cow horn, which is hand-selected for its color and size. The tumblers are meticulously sanded, heated and molded to fit perfectly in your hand, then polished for a smooth, shiny finish.

Specs:

•	Set of 2
•	Light-colored cow horn
•	Approximate Dimensions: 3"w x 4"h 
•	Materials: Locally-sourced, polished Ankole cattle horn

Notes:

Each tumbler is unique, one of a kind and handmade by an artisan in Uganda. Therefore, the grain, color and size may vary from those pictured. To care for tumblers, hand wash with mild soap and lukewarm water and towel dry immediately.

description:

name: Raw Wood Charcuterie Board
description:
This deeply grained, raw Mugavu wood board is excellent as a prep surface or platter, designed for serving charcuterie and cheeses. It is perfect for everyday use and is as stunning as it is durable. 

Specs:

•	Approximate Dimensions: 8"w x 21"h (including handle)
•	Locally-sourced Mugavu wood

Notes: 

Each board is unique, one of a kind and handmade by an artisan in Uganda. Therefore, the color and grain may vary from that pictured. To care for board, hand wash with mild soap and lukewarm water and towel dry immediately. To keep the wood well conditioned and protected, it is recommended that you apply beeswax salve or wood oil every 3-4 weeks.

name: Dipped Wine Holder, White
description:
We took our original wine holder and then hand-dipped it in rich, vibrant paint for an unexpected pop of color. Its light, slender form and unique curvature make this minimalist wine holder the perfect way to display your favorite vintage bottle. Hand-turned by lathe using solid Mugavu wood, then sanded to perfection and varnished for a smooth and seamless finish. 

Specs:

•	Approximate Dimensions: 2"w x 11"h 
•	Locally-sourced Mugavu wood
•	White, paraffin-free paint

Notes:

Each wine holder is unique, one of a kind and hand-turned on a lathe by an artisan in Uganda. Therefore, the color, grain and paint placement may vary from that pictured.  To care for wine holder, simply wipe clean.

name: Original Wine Holder
description:
Its light, slender form and unique curvature make this minimalist wine holder the perfect way to display your favorite vintage bottle. Hand-turned by lathe using solid Mugavu wood, then sanded to perfection and varnished for a smooth and seamless finish. 

Specs:

•	Approximate Dimensions: 2"w x 11"h 
•	Locally-sourced Mugavu wood

Notes:

Each wine holder is unique, one of a kind and hand-turned on a lathe by an artisan in Uganda. Therefore, the color and grain may vary from that pictured.  To care for wine holder, simply wipe clean.

name: Dug Out Bowl
description:
A true piece of art, this large, dramatic bowl was meticulously hand carved and sanded out of a large piece of Mugavu wood. It is beautiful as a table centerpiece, a piece of decor to liven up the living room, or as a way to display fruits and vegetables in the kitchen. 

Specs:

•	Approximate Dimensions: 20" wide x 15" long x 6" deep
•	Weighs approximately 7 pounds
•	Materials: Locally-sourced Mugavu Wood 

Notes: 

Each bowl is unique, one of a kind and hand carved by an artisan in Uganda. Therefore, the color, grain and exact dimensions may vary from that pictured. To care for bowl, hand wash with mild soap and lukewarm water and towel dry immediately. To keep the wood well conditioned and protected, it is recommended that you apply beeswax salve or wood oil every 3-4 weeks.

name: Noodle Bowl
description:
This perfectly minimalist bowl is sure to be your favorite. It is constructed from solid Mugavu wood, giving it a beautiful grain and smooth finish. It is perfect for ladling noodle soup or simply to display fruit on the countertop.
 
Specs:

•	Approximate Dimensions: 5.5"w x 4"h
•	Materials: Locally-sourced Mugavu Wood 

Notes: 

Each bowl is unique, one of a kind and hand-turned on a lathe by an artisan in Uganda. Therefore, the color and grain may vary from that pictured. To care for bowl, hand wash with mild soap and lukewarm water and towel dry immediately. To keep the wood well conditioned and protected, it is recommended that you apply beeswax salve or wood oil every 3-4 weeks.

name: Hand-woven Cotton Throw Blanket
description:
This exceptionally soft cotton throw blanket is hand-woven by skilled Ugandan artisans.

Specs:

•	Dimensions: 78" x 39" (6.5' x 3.2')
•	Cream in color
•	Fringe detail on both ends
•	Handcrafted; each throw is unique
•	Materials: 100% Cotton

Notes:

Each blanket is one of a kind and handmade by an artisan in Uganda. Machine wash and hang to dry.

name: Hand-woven Moroccan Rug (Cream & Navy)
description:
This hand-woven flat-weave rug from Morocco is made with vegetable-dyed wool, making it extremely durable and likely to last for a lifetime. It adds color and charm to any room. 

Specs:

•	Dimensions: 77" x 58" (6.4' x 4.8')
•	Cotton fringe detail on both ends
•	Imported from Morocco
•	Handcrafted; each rug is unique
•	Materials: 100% Wool

Notes:

This item is final sale.

To care for rug, vacuum regularly to prevent dust and crumbs from settling into roots of fibers. Turn rug around occasionally to equalize wear. Remove spills immediately by blotting with a soft cloth. For hard-to-remove stains, professional rug cleaning is recommended.

name: Half Moon Bangle
description:
This dainty, uniquely shaped brass bangle is beautiful worn alone or stacked with your other favorites. 

Specs:

•	Approximate Dimensions: 2.5" inside diameter, 3" total width
•	Materials: Locally-sourced, recycled brass

Notes:

Each bracelet is one of a kind and handmade by an artisan in Uganda. Therefore, the color and exact size and shape of each bracelet may vary slightly from that pictured.  True brass tends to tarnish quickly when exposed to air, so to care for bracelet, wipe down weekly with brass polish using a clean, soft cloth. Due to its delicate nature, it's best to keep stored in its dust bag.

name: Gladiator Cuff with Brass Chevron Dots, Light Horn
description:
This bracelet is the kind of piece that completes an outfit. It is made from ethically sourced, Ugandan cow horn and then embellished with a beautiful brass chevron design, making it an exotic, eye-catching and beautiful arm adornment. 

Specs:

•	Approximate Dimensions: 2.5" inside diameter, 4" length
•	Open at back
•	Slip-on style
•	Light-colored cow horn
•	Materials: Locally-sourced, polished Ankole cattle horn and locally-sourced, recycled brass

Notes:

Each bracelet is one of a kind and handmade by an artisan in Uganda. Therefore, the color and exact size and shape of each bracelet may vary slightly from that pictured. To care for bracelet, wipe down weekly using a clean, soft cloth. Due to its delicate nature, it's best to keep stored in its dust bag.

description:
Celebrating true African craftsmanship, this bracelet is handmade from Ugandan cow horn and then complimented by inlayed, locally sourced brass -- making it unexpected, modern and completely unique. 

Specs:

•	Approximate Dimensions: 2.5" inner diameter, 1.5" thick
•	Hand-laid brass detailing
•	Slip-on style
•	Light-colored cow horn

name: Cow Horn & Brass Bangle Set
description:
These beautiful bangles are handmade using recycled brass and ethically sourced Ankole cow horn. The brass bangles are hammered by hand and a brass inlay complements each cow horn bangle. Lightweight and neutral, this artisanal set is perfect for everyday wear.

Specs:

•	Approximate Dimensions: 2.5" inner diameter; 1.5" when stacked
•	Set of 6
•	4 hand-hammered brass bangles 
•	2 mixed-colors cow horn bangles with hand-laid brass detailing
•	Slip-on style
•	Materials: Locally-sourced, recycled brass and locally-sourced, polished Ankole cattle horn

Notes:

Each bangle set is one of a kind and handmade by an artisan in Uganda. Therefore, the color and exact size and shape of each bracelet may vary slightly from that pictured. True brass tends to tarnish quickly when exposed to air, so to care for bracelets, wipe down weekly with brass polish using a clean, soft cloth. Due to their delicate nature, it's best to keep them stored in their dust bag.
